values: And I really dont have much to say. Im doing fine. School started this week so there is that. I spent the greater part of this evening removing myself from entirely TOO many email list. Not lifestyle stuff, but retail stuff. This will cut down on the mail in my inbox drmatically. It had really gotten to the point where I would go a week , sometimes two without checking my email just because I didnt want to deal  with it. Tonight I spent some time taking care of that. Ive been reading, not commenting much but I know what y'all have been up to and rest assured I will make a post of real content soon to let y'all know whats been going on with me. Till then, Im off to wind down for the night.

So, we had this clog in the sink in the bathroom. I treated it and it returned. Again I treated it and again it returned.  Fed up and at the end of my rope with The Clog, I went to Wal-Mart and got a bottle of Instant Power Hair Clog Remover. Its 6 bucks a bottle. This stuff works !!! You have to follow the directions and you have to give it time but I promise you it works and it comes with a gurantee from the manufacturer as well. So if ya got a clog that you cant seem to get rid of, I would recommend this. Great stuff in a red bottle.  Oh, and for the love of all that is holy, PLEASE read the warnings!!!! This stuff is CRAZY dangerous if you dont use it properly.

0514—Passed

What that means is that I passed my English 101  exit exam!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 

Of course I want to take a look at my exam so I am going to stop by his office on Tuesday afternoon and see if I can take a peek at it and possibly keep it.

I have successfully passed at least one of my very first college classes. Math is Wednesday.

I'll let y'all know the final grades in both classes when everything is officially posted

Hear Ye Hear Ye

So put on some funk and fucking celebrate bitches !!!!!

So, apprently a new  "club" has opened in the New Orleans area. I have heard wonderful things about the people running it and from what I understand they  have a "play room" for people of like mind. Some people I know are visiting the new place this evening as an invitation for members of the local BDSM organization has been extended, with I believe a discount on the door fee. 

I want to understand, and Im not a lawyer, I dont have any experience with vice or anything like that. but I do NOT understand how these , lets be honest, sex clubs can open and be open about what goes on there but bdsm organizations have to fly under the radar to avoid being shut down for whatever reason. It cant be as simple as "there is no consensual battery law" can it? 

Okay I know there are some legal eagles on my f'list and Im asking for comments/opinions on this. Please feel free to comment annonymously if you wish  as I do not wish for anyone to out themselves on my blog. This is just something that I have always had issue with and I would really appreciate some help in understanding why this is the way it is.

And I am off to bed soon. Its supposed to be VERY cold tomorrow and I need to wake up early to allow for time for the car to heat up some and just in case there is some ice on the windshield . 

In other news I just have to get this out. God damnit I want a VENTI white chocolate mocha with whip . All fifteen points of  it.
Theres your Tet again dear heart.

But before I do that... 


WE HAVE A BABY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 

My BESTEST Beth had a BABY GIRL this morning. She was at the hospital for 630 AM and we had a baby by Nine AM 

She had a C-section because of the baby being breach. Momma and baby are fine. I havent seen the little bundle of love yet because when I finally got to the hospital after work tonight, almost seven PM,  I couldnt go to the NICU to see her. Shes fine but its standard procedure when the babies are this early (six weeks). Shes Five Pounds three  ounces and umm.. 18 inches long , or 21 I cant remember off hand. 

I am BEYOND happy for my Beth. She hasnt had an alone moment since all this began. Between her friends and family and Pete, (baby daddy) family, shes being WELL taken care of. 


Okay, Math calls.
Type your cut contents here.

We're out of milk and I need some things from the store but before I head out, I must take a moment to acknowledge  's birthday today.

Happy Birthday to someone who I want to know better but who I truly enjoy spending time, albeit, limited time, with whenever our paths cross.

Im at work this morning, waiting to punch in and get my day started. Today, our nation swears in a new leader. It's an exciting day for our nation. Not only are we getting a new President but we are also adding to the history books of our nation by swearing into office our first African-American President. Okay we all know he's bi-racial and truth be told it bothers me that he doesnt identify that way but I dont think that it has any direct effect on his ability to lead the nation. One thing is certain, the next four years will NOT be easy for the nation. In general, as a society, we do not adapt to change well and soon to be President Obama's whole platform is on CHANGE. 

I, like many others was very glad to have done my small part, by voting, to help bring this change to the nation. We'll see what the next four years bring.

And the ONLY thing I have to say is... 

Goodbye 290's 
Goodbye 280's 
Goodbye FINALLY 270's and 

HELLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO 260's !!!!!! 

Todays weigh in numbers... 266.6 a loss of 4.2 from last weeks weigh in.!!! 

God damn I rocked my OWN socks off on this one!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

What this means is that I FINALLY broke  the 25 pound mark on my weight loss. the 25 pounds that has been eluding me for oh so long. Just a few more pounds to go for my ten percent. 

I can do this. I will do this. I HAVE to do this. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Eleventy One!!!!

If you have three hours to kill and lose yourself in a movie to, and a box of tissues, go see The Curious Case of Benjamin Button. Its a very good piece of cinema very reminiscient of Forrest Gump. VERY much like Forrest Gump. Scott, April and I went over the weekend, yes I paid almost ten bucks a ticket for it and it was VERY well worth it. Word of warning, do NOT get the super ultra mega bottle of Disani at the concession stand. I had been having to pee since he was like 70 but I just couldnt tear myself away from my seat. SPEAKING of my seat... the most amazing wonderful thing happned at the show...

I sat down and where my hips normally graze the side of the chairs there, although I fit comfortably, they didnt graze the armrests.!!!!!!! 

So yeah Benjamin Button.. Go see it. 

I left there is DESPERATE want of a Clover Grill burger though.

I think I have hit the homeowner of an old house, tri-fecta! 

They came and remeasured for the windows today, he said they shoudl be ready for install in about two weeks.. TWO WEEKS.. OMG. 
The electrical people are coming next Wednesday.. Yay!!! and Now... 

The hot water in the tub has been running at more than a trickle but nowhere near what it should be for awhile now and Ive  had just about enough of it so I called the lovely people at Roto Rooter to come out.. he came out, said , well.. you have galvanized steel piping... you need to replace that, its okay for now but eventually its going to need replacing. Hes going to have soemone call me to see if someoen can come out later this afternoon/evening and work me up a price. Dear lord.. new pipes. I mean nothing is broken.. just old. Its a raised house so they wont have to bust into the foundation but oh good lord, plumbing.  I dont even want to THINK about what they are going to want to charge me. Time to sceduele more estimates... the issue is going to be finding someone who will give free estimates.. Roto Rooter gives free estimates.  Lord help me if the work I am doing on this house does not increase its value Im going to scream bloody fucking murder. 

There isnt enough money after the roof (three years ago), the new electrical and the windows for plumbing.. Im going to have to see about financing. Maybe the house can go one more year. We'll see.. I'll talk to Mr Man tonight and we'll decide on something AFTER I get some estimates scedueled and some prices down on paper. 

Ahh... the joys and sorrows of home ownership.

Im working Xmas eve and Xmas day. Its going to be a good holiday. Its going to be very warm for Xmas but thats nothing unusual here in South Louisiana. There are, right at this moment, two pans of bread pudding courtesy of the husband type person in the fridge. One is going to the brother in laws tomorrow evening for the Xmas eve get together, and one is going to work with me, per coworkers request. There is one chocolate cherry fudge for Xmas eve tomorrow and there is crustless pumpkin pie cooling on the stove for Xmas eve tomorrow. Ive never made the pumpkin pie before and Im kinda concerned but I followed the recipie. If its not good its not good and I wont make it again. You live you learn. 

  The candy bags are done and ready to go to work with me in the morning. I have to get up early to make sure I have everything together for work. I love this time of year at work. Presents.. holiday cheer and the best thing.. ITS ALMOST OVER then... DUN DUN DUN... AFTER Xmas SALES !!!!!!!!!!!!!! (I will NOT bring more crap into this house. I will NOT bring more crap into this house). This weekend im off and I have grand plans on finishing the storage room. This can be done, it WILL be done. It HAS to get done.

Wherever the holidays find you this week, I hope they find you all well. 

Much love y'all

I have a "nice to meet ya" coffee date in a couple of hours so I really need to go take a shower. Yeah I do bathe when Im meeting people yo. But I wanted to take a  moment  to say that if you have a couple of hours to blow one evening or afternoon, go see Bolt. Its a nice bit of fluff that speaks to the power of love and the human condition as it pertains to the bond between animals and thier humans and vice versa. 

Next on the wanna go see it, The Tale of Despereaux. Scott really wants to go see this and im just OMG squee that he wants to go so thats the plan sometime after the holidays since during the holiday season which is this week, movie tix are full price.
Im doing some stuff online and the Food Porn channel. (Food Network) is on in the background and Paula Deen just referred to her OWN food as crap!

It was asked so Im going to do my level best to answer. WW is not so much about how many of something you can have but more about how many points are in that something that you are having. The pineapple I eat is canned. A bit larger than the size of a tuna can.. there is aprox. one cup in a can or two servings at half a cup each. When I run the nutritional information through the calculator it comes back at me at 2pts for the whole can. These are pineapples in thier own juice NOT in syrup. Once you add in the extra syrup I think the pts increase by at least two. And WW math is kinda psychotic.. like I can eat one 1pt cake now and one 1pt cake later and it be 2pts.. but if I eat 2 together its 3 pts. Its all about the numbers.. the calories, the fat and the fiber.. something with the fiber helps cancel out the fat and the more fiber , the less the points <not always but most of the time>. Yes its a LOT of counting and you gotta do the homework.. but its worth it. There are also SEVERAL zero pt foods. A bunch of veggies are zero pts so yay.. although just because something is zero pts doesnt mean I can eat as much of that as I want to. You can gain twenty pounds eating nothing but veggies just as easily as you can gain 20 pounds eating trash. In the end its ALL about portion control and watching what you eat. WW teaches you how to eat for your body type and the body that you want to achieve. The more weight you have to lose, the more pts you have to eat.. strange huh? You would think the more you have to lose the less you can eat but its a formula and it works. Im at 34 pts a day and there are some ladies in my group who have like 17 a day. I think the bare minimum is 16 a day.  So, how many? As long as it fits into your pts. (Okay maybe not that easy cuz well.. a snickers bar fits into my pts but it doesnt mean I should have it)....
